mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reserve ( reserve_idx, product_idx, customer_idx, reserve_qty, reserve_memo, reserve_receive_time ) VALUES ( SEQ_RESERVE.NEXTVAL, #{productIdx}, #{customerIdx}, #{reserveQty}, #{reserveMemo}, #{reserveReceiveTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT R.RESERVE_IDX reserveIdx ,R.RESERVE_TIME reserveTime ,P.PRODUCT_IDX productIdx ,P.PRODUCT_NAME productName ,P.PRODUCT_INFO productInfo ,P.PRODUCT_PRICE productPrice ,R.RESERVE_QTY reserveQty ,R.RESERVE_RECEIVE_TIME reserveReceiveTime ,R.RESERVE_MEMO reserveMemo ,R.RESERVE_FLAG reserveFlag ,R.CUSTOMER_IDX customerIdx ,M.MEMBER_ID memberId ,M.MEMBER_NAME memberName ,M.MEMBER_TEL memberTel ,P.SEL_IDX selIdx ,pi.product_img_uuid productImgUuid FROM TBL_RESERVE R , TBL_PRODUCT P , TBL_MEMBER M , TBL_CUSTOMER C , tbl_product_img pi WHERE R.RESERVE_IDX = #{reserveIdx} AND C.CUSTOMER_IDX=R.CUSTOMER_IDX AND M.MEMBER_IDX = C.MEMBER_IDX AND R.PRODUCT_IDX = P.PRODUCT_IDX and p.product_idx = pi.product_idx

SELECT rn, total, reserveIdx, reserveTime, productIdx, productName, productInfo, productPrice, reserveQty, reserveReceiveTime, reserveMemo, reserveFlag, customerIdx, memberId, memberName, memberTel, selIdx, marId, selStore FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, COUNT(reserveIdx) OVER() total, s.reserveIdx reserveIdx, s.reserveTime reserveTime, s.productIdx productIdx, s.productName productName, s.productInfo productInfo, s.productPrice productPrice, s.reserveQty reserveQty, s.reserveReceiveTime reserveReceiveTime, s.reserveMemo reserveMemo, s.reserveFlag reserveFlag, s.customerIdx customerIdx, m.member_id memberId, m.member_name memberName, m.member_tel memberTel, s.selIdx selIdx, s.marId marId, s.selStore selStore FROM tbl_member m, tbl_customer c, ( SELECT r.reserve_idx reserveIdx, TO_CHAR(r.reserve_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reserveTime, p.product_idx productIdx, p.product_name productName, p.product_info productInfo, p.product_price productPrice, r.reserve_qty reserveQty, r.reserve_receive_time reserveReceiveTime, r.reserve_memo reserveMemo, r.reserve_flag reserveFlag, r.customer_idx customerIdx, se.sel_idx selIdx, ma.mar_id marId, se.sel_store selStore FROM tbl_seller se, tbl_market ma , tbl_reserve r, tbl_product p WHERE se.guname_marid = ma.guname_marid
AND r.customer_idx = #{vo.customerIdx}
AND se.sel_idx = #{vo.selIdx}
AND r.product_idx = p.product_idx AND p.sel_idx = se.sel_idx ORDER BY r.reserve_idx DESC ) s WHERE s.customerIdx = c.customer_idx AND c.member_idx = m.member_idx
AND s.productName like '%'||#{cri.keyword}||'%' AND s.productInfo like '%'||#{cri.keyword}||'%'
AND s.reserveTime like '%'||#{cri.keyword}||'%'
AND s.reserveReceiveTime like '%'||#{cri.keyword}||'%'
AND m.member_id like '%'||#{cri.keyword}||'%'
AND m.member_name like '%'||#{cri.keyword}||'%'
AND s.marId like '%'||#{cri.keyword}||'%'
AND s.selStore like '%'||#{cri.keyword}||'%'
AND ROWNUM <= (CEIL(#{cri.page} / 10) * 100) + 1 ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.page} - 1) * 10 AND rn <= #{cri.page} * 10
